title: My proposal to fix balance changes in league of legends
body: League of legends is one of if not the best moba game out there. Many players/streamers are fed up with the balance changes and the meta that they either don't care anymore or the are quitting. I have a proposal that could potentially fix this problem and save league. DM me if u want to know more.

replies.body: Or you could state it here so boards dwellers can eat you alive on how bad they are. Cause no one gonna dm u :)
funny how people in boards flame anyone who post something about balance while they never agree on something
